p: All treatments were performed in triplicate, and the results were expressed by their mean values and the standard deviations (SD). The experimental data were submitted to analysis of variance (one-way ANOVA) to determine significant differences by PROC ANOVA of SAS version 9.2 (SAS Institute Inc., Cary, NC, USA). The term significant difference was based on p â‰¤ 0.05.
